content: a cozy and cuddly hot water bottle cover thick enough to warm your toes on even the chilliest of winter nights haworth was designed to look just a little bit antique a touch old-fashioned the finished cozy reminded me of reading classics by the bront&#235 sisters - books that really should be read on a dark and snowy day - and so it was named after the quiet and charming village they spent their lives in haworth is knit in the round from the bottom up in one piece a buttonband across the back is worked with help from a provisional cast on and the whole cozy requires only minimal finishing the cable pattern is *charted only* and construction instructions are written in full pattern requires scrap yarn a crochet hook for provisional cast on and three 5/8 buttons
